summary: An email from an FBI agent in New York requesting more recent aerial photos of Jeffrey Epstein's island, referencing a recent flyover and seeking better imagery for investigation purposes.

persons.name: SSA - Squad C-20 Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting aerial photos of Epstein's island for investigative purposes.

events.title: Request for Aerial Photos of Epstein Island
events.description: An FBI agent emails colleagues requesting more recent aerial photos of Jeffrey Epstein's island, mentioning a recent flyover.
personsInvolved: SSA - Squad C-20 Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking FBI New York

locations: Epstein's island (Little St. James or similar private island owned by Jeffrey Epstein)
keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Epstein's island as of August 2019.
The FBI had conducted a recent flyover of Epstein's island to gather aerial imagery.
The email indicates ongoing investigative efforts into crimes against children and human trafficking related to Epstein.
The document shows coordination within the FBI's New York field office regarding the Epstein investigation.
